original_text: But Peter and John answered them, “Whether it is right in the sight of God to listen to you rather than to God, you must judge,
korean_text: 베드로와 요한이 대답하여 이르되 하나님 앞에서 너희의 말을 듣는 것이 하나님의 말씀을 듣는 것보다 옳은가 판단하라

sentences.original_text: But Peter and John answered them,
Whether it is right in the sight of God
to listen to you rather than to God,
